biotools.summary: Click-ExM is a tool, which integrates click labeling into Expansion microscopy (ExM) to enable a ‘one-stop-shop’ method for nanoscale imaging of various types of biomolecule. By click labeling with biotin and staining with fluorescently labeled streptavidin, a large range of biomolecules can be imaged by the standard ExM procedure normally used for proteins.
